title: Jinx
body: I wanna know everything about her, and I don't know which board to go to for lore. =/ All I know is what I get from the buff she gets when the enemy team has Vi or Caitlyn and this bit here- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0nlJuwO0GDs.

replies.body:
Jinx is a cool ass chick. She is known to be from Zaun, although nobody is 100% that's where she originated from. Her personality is because the embodiment of chaos, she just absolutely loves it.  She is willing to blow up anything that will create big fires, explosions and flashing lights at the expense of the people around her. However, Jinx is not a psycho-crazy-killer who would just run up to someone and stab them for the joy of it. If she does kill someone, it's likely because they were in the wrong place at wrong time.

No one is quite sure what her beef with VI is, though there are speculations. The biggest is that VI & Jinx are siblings, but that hasn't been confirmed. I've read that VI has absolutely no past memories of Jinx, as said by a red. There's also the speculation of Jinx being another clone/experiment like what Vi is speculated to be.

Umm...I'm sure there's more, like Jinx & Ziggs are buddies which might seem odd since Ziggs is (as far as we know) loyal to Piltover and Jinx is speculated to be from Zaun (since she has been seen running wild and causing chaos there). But both Ziggs and Jinx love things that go BOOM-KABLOW-BAM!

> Jinx is a cool ass chick. She is known to be from Zaun, although nobody is 100% that's where she originated from. Her personality is because the embodiment of chaos, she just absolutely loves it.  She is willing to blow up anything that will create big fires, explosions and flashing lights at the expense of the people around her. However, Jinx is not a psycho-crazy-killer who would just run up to someone and stab them for the joy of it. If she does kill someone, it's likely because they were in the wrong place at wrong time.
> 
> No one is quite sure what her beef with VI is, though there are speculations. The biggest is that VI & Jinx are siblings, but that hasn't been confirmed. I've read that VI has absolutely no past memories of Jinx, as said by a red. There's also the speculation of Jinx being another clone/experiment like what Vi is speculated to be.
> 
> Umm...I'm sure there's more, like Jinx & Ziggs are buddies which might seem odd since Ziggs is (as far as we know) loyal to Piltover and Jinx is speculated to be from Zaun (since she has been seen running wild and causing chaos there). But both Ziggs and Jinx love things that go BOOM-KABLOW-BAM!

A red confirmed that Ziggs is terrified of Jinx.
They did also say that Jinx and Vi were not siblings.
My bad, Ziggs isn't loyal to Piltover, he's loyal to Bandle City I believe.
Thank you so much! Good things to know =D. Does Jinx have a full name? You know, Miss Fortune is Sarah Fortune...

Also, thanks for the conspiracy theories. Bandle City and Zaun are teaming up to destroy Piltover <3. If rito made this a real story line...omg...i would be so happy. (Reason is because a Jinx/Teemo bot lane is terrifying.)

actually Ziggs and jinx aren't buddies,while they love explosions,there is the difference that ziggs has moral standards and jinx doesn't really have ones.

I remember a rioter saying that if Ziggs was about to meet jinx,jinx would probably try to cuddle him,while ziggs would try to run away from her.
Ah. Do you know anything else?

Ah okay, yeah I see Ziggs is apparently terrified of Jinx which gave me a laugh haha. On her page I believe it shows him as a friend, but I can see how Ziggs doesn't consider Jinx a friend. 

As for her name, it's because if you're around when Jinx is around, you're bound to be unlucky. She's jinxed. You're jinxed if you're around her. So hey, let's name the nameless crazy lady, Jinx!

Well it was also said during the jinx ama,that her eye and hair colours are not her original ones,which means she probably dyes her hair(dunno about the eye colours though),but it could also be the result of some experiment.

Also while it is speculated that vi and jinxs are sisters,it is at least known that both of them do have a sister,but we don't know much more about their families.

I might remember some other stuff later on.

Go to the Champions page on the site and look for Jinx.  She should have a lore entry there.  You might want to ask somebody else for the details though, since I know way less about Jinx than most champs.

Checked it out, thanks. 
And this- http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3902618
And this too- http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-reveal/jinx-loose-cannon-revealed
Your link too btw- http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Jinx
Bump in hopes my thread doesn't disappear. =/ I wanna know my fave champ, even if the lore is getting mixed up. =)
Yea... I wish they made it a little more clear where were supposed to read up on the lore. Right now it all feels pretty scattered so I don't really bother.
